achievements.title: Refined Data Processing Pipeline
achievements.description: Refined data processing in the model build and analysis pipeline at the National Renewable Energy Laboratory, transforming raw data into inferred values with comprehensive automated unit and integration testing.

achievements.title: Optimized System Scalability
achievements.description: Optimized system scalability through time complexity improvements, enhancing overall performance at the National Renewable Energy Laboratory.

achievements.title: Automated DevOps Processes
achievements.description: Streamlined and automated DevOps processes by restructuring CI/CD workflows with GitHub Actions at the National Renewable Energy Laboratory.

achievements.title: Implemented OFSAA LLFP Fintech Solutions
achievements.description: Implemented OFSAA LLFP fintech solutions in SIT, UAT and provided post-implementation support in Production environments for 2 international financial banking firms at Oracle Financial Services Software.

achievements.title: Engineered ETL Workflows
achievements.description: Engineered 6 GUI-based workflow runs for ETL pipelines, integrating them with backend scripts for data processing at Oracle Financial Services Software.

achievements.title: Reduced Execution Times by 20%
achievements.description: Generated PL/SQL scripts for data manipulation and validation at Oracle Financial Services Software, automating manual tasks and reducing execution times by 20%.

achievements.title: Overall Winner - AICamp Generative AI Hackathon
achievements.description: Won the AWS for Startups prize for creating a multimodal AI assistant that automates browser tasks at the AICamp Generative AI Hackathon.

achievements.title: Developed Microservices Video to MP3 Converter
achievements.description: Engineered a distributed system for converting video files to MP3 format using microservices architecture.

achievements.title: Voice AI Interviewer Agent
achievements.description: Engineered an AI-powered voice interviewer, leveraging Groq for fast inference and Vapi for voice interactions.
